    • breadthFirstSearch

      public static int[] breadthFirstSearch​(GraphADT graph, int start)
      Perform a breadth-first search of a graph. post: The array parent will contain the predecessor of each vertex in the breadth-first search tree.
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph to be searched
      start - The start vertex
      Returns:
      The array of parents
